title: Is it possible to complete the whole syllabus of class 11 in only one month? - Quora

response.answer_text: Buddy, you can finish reading your syllabus even on the pre-exam night. It all depends on how you see your studies and how you wanna see your result. Once you have a clear vision how you wish to see your reports and knowledge armoury. Schedule your reading time and stick to your plan. I do not deny the fact that task is going to be a hard one. You got to work hard but more importantly you need to work smarter. Tips: ∆ Make small goals but be very particular about achieving them. ∆ Focus on the parts which can give you maximum returns (marks). Be sure about the marks distribution part. ∆ Do not hesitate in taking help from batch mates who study on regular basis. Pull up your pants, Tighten up your belt, Put up your armour, Hit the bull's eye. Best of Luck. Hope, it helps!
